snippet: President Obama wants the Israelis or Palestinians to make the next move, an administration official said.
abstract: White House Memo; Pres Obama reportedly wants Israelis and Palestinians to approach the United States with their ideas for how to revive peace negotiations; for now, Obama has instructed Sec of State John Kerry to shift his attention to nuclear negotiations with Iran, which are heading into a decisive phase, crisis in Ukraine and the longer-term American strategic shift to Asia--policy that has gained urgency with Obama's recent trip to the region.
lead_paragraph: President Obama wants the Israelis or Palestinians to make the next move, an administration official said.

headline.main: Mideast Peace Effort Pauses to Let Failure Sink In
headline.print_headline: Mideast Peace Effort Pauses to Let Failure Sink In
